Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Carpet stained quite poor Lack of facilities in the hotel generally Check in staff tried to apply the wrong room rate to the room both on check in and check out I e no lesson learned first time around English language skills of staff could be a little better Not a 4 star experience more 3 star Room a little claustrophobic as it was at eye level with roof of courtyard covered bar
Positive_Review: They did have a universal adaptor which I went down to collect from reception there was no offer to send it up Shower room clean

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: We were traveling with our 2 kids 10 and 12 and booked the room with 2 full bathrooms It was perfect The bathrooms are large by hotel standards and the hotel was recently renovated so everything still was relatively new The price reflects the slightly off the beaten path location but you can reach great places in a 10 15 minute walk Would definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: We had a great two nights at the Hotel L Echiquier Opera The room was a good size for Paris accomodation The room was so quiet and the bed was amazing Breakfast was excellent We will be back to this accomodation

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Didn t enjoy eating in the bar lounge better restaurants available locally Easy enough to get to from the airport but like most places in Paris involved a couple of tube changes
Positive_Review: Room was spacious and comfortable

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: There was nothing we didn t like
Positive_Review: The staff were all very helpful and happy to help The breakfast choice was very good The bed was very comfortable

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Parking was a bit of a challenge but I was informed that valet is available and previously it was not stated in the description of the facilities
Positive_Review: Everything was great I love this hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The pillows were not very comfortable the hotel temperature was a bit hot
Positive_Review: Good wi fi comfortable room very very nice staff hotel clean and tidy good mojito

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Rooms and breakfast are really expensive but worth every cent
Positive_Review: Stayed there once before the renovation and must say that everything is better now especially the breakfast Good location close to two metro station close to cafes very nice and comfortable rooms and a very friendly and helpful staff All this made our stay very pleasant and will come back if we find a good deal someday

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The location was a little out of the way by 2 or 3 minutes walking of where we wanted to be Only a problem because we should ve packed lighter
Positive_Review: Best bed we slept on in Europe Very comfortable quiet and chic

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Rooms could be a little big bigger
Positive_Review: I spend most of my life in h tels for my work and Hotel de l Echiquier has the best service I have seen for years Polite discreet very efficient and both respectful and not obsequious Location is also great to enjoy Parisian life in a quiet place

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Service provided was excellent Every contact we had with the staff both at the reception and at the breakfast was pleasant The room we had was very small but comfortable I loved the pillows Everything we had for breakfast was delicious and fresh The location of the hotel is great you can get to the main spots of Paris all on foot

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Very attractive building superb extensive breakfast well appointed rooms professional friendly staff at a very reasonable price Great location for walking around many of the sights in Paris and good selection of bars and restaurants round about Convenient for Gare Du Nord we walked it in approx 10 mins We stayed six nights

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: The Staff especially the team that served us breakfast the 4 days were amazing and helpful On Valentine s day they helped me surprising my partner and more Great place the metro is near as well

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: no prunes for breakfast really thats all I can think of Everything else was really great
Positive_Review: Fantastic pillow actually slept so well and room was quiet too and lovely staff too oh and so so clean none of the places I checked were dusty not even a tiny bit this is very rare

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: We thought breakfast was until 12 We couldnt eat much cuz they were starting to clean 10minbefore 11xD
Positive_Review: Great welcoming and staffs were great We had a very good stay

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Breakfast was really good but still limited for kids
Positive_Review: We stayed over the weekend and enjoyed our time in this hotel Though the location of the hotel is a little bit off from the key sights taxi didn t take us too long staff rooms were much better vs our expectations we would definitely come back

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Great staff great location 2 min from Metro super nice room very comfortable bed very clean The breakfast was really good the cocktails at the bar too although overpriced as usual at hotel bars We would probably stay at this hotel again next time we are in Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: The variety at breakfast was superb with a lovely friendly service also Bedrooms lovely comfortable with it cleaned each day during our stay Also was very impressed with how clean the entire hotel was a very well organised hotel with excellent staff to match Wifi throughout the hotel was excellent as well Would recommend to anyone travelling to Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Staff was friendly helpful nice Hotel location near la fayetter street Bonnee nouvelle metro station about 3 5 mins walking 4 mins by metro to the opera Alot of resturants around the hotel area All in all an excellent experience in my view

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The location is a bit off the beaten track but there is a metro close by
Positive_Review: Nicely designed hotel with a lovely restaurant cafe area The servers in the restaurant were beyond kind which is rare in Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Nothing to add to the above
Positive_Review: Good location near but not too near Gare du Nord Very friendly and helpful staff Nice building with some original touches Rooms quiet comfortable slightly corporate feel could do with some personal touches but of course it s part of a large chain Liked that there were options for full or express breakfast Recommended for short stay and when travelling by Eurostar

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Only one thing the set up of the room was not convenient not user friendly
Positive_Review: Great staff great vibes Very nice place for the buffet as well

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Breakfast had 2 price options both seemed expensive so we went to a local cafe
Positive_Review: Staff helpful rooms very quiet very comfortable bed bathroom products divine

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Got upgraded to jr suite from standard room because it was our 10th wedding anniversary holiday Very nice hotel with Gatsby style decor excellent breakfast and very friendly staff Good location

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Can t think of any negatives
Positive_Review: Hotel staff were ALL exceptionally helpful and friendly Bar area and breakfast selection was very good Oh and the retro lift was just right too Would definitely return

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: The hotel staff were spectacular the room was very luxurious and the food and drink was amazing We will definitely be heading back there in the future

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Hospitality was more than amazing Atmosphere of the hotel was sensual and the location is great The room was clean and comfy We enjoyed the stay in every aspect

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Great location close to two metro stations Great neighborhood with restaurants and bars Short walk to the Opera Garnier and Galeries Lafayette The breakfast was great lots of choice although twenty five euro person

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The free wifi was a little so but hey it was free
Positive_Review: Beautiful high quality hotel with a gorgeous Art Deco quality The staff were extremely friendly and helpful Our French isn t the strongest so it helped that their English was far better We had breakfast included and it was such good quality Great location in terms of restaurants and metro links

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: The receptionists are very friendly and helpful Located in an building with at least 100years old the first time to ride an original elevator Room is quite big for this price and have two large windows facing the street Very clean and facilities in the bathroom is quite new

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Though very close to metro stations you can find better located hotels with nicer neighborhood
Positive_Review: High quality neat friendly hotel Great breakfast Nice sheets and bath

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: More complimentary coffee and milk rather than just enough for one drink
Positive_Review: Beds incredibly comfy Staff very helpful Great toiletries Room small but thoughtful and s great little balcony

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Staff helpful and rooms very clean and modern Breakfast way too expensive 25 per person Eat at cafes outside for less than half price Surrounding area is dirty Some good restaurants nearby but better areas to stay in Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Location for us was a little far from attractions and having a child to drag along on Metro etc was a little difficult for us
Positive_Review: Very nice boutique hotel Excellent presentation and staff were lovely

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: I had a room on the 5th floor and I could hear the room above and the noise level was quite loud The bed was not really a large double but two single beds pushed together
Positive_Review: almost everything clean fabulously styled bar and lounge is brilliant right out of an old Hollywood film very glamorous The bathroom is immaculate with amazing Clarins toiletries I was given an upgrade from a classic room to a superior room which was nice

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Location is a bit away from major attractions but the Bonne Nouvelle Metro Station is a few blocks away
Positive_Review: Friendly Staff Clean Rooms Great Brakfast

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Well situated hotel The beds are comfy and the rooms are quite and the breakfast is just great Very helpful and friendly staff Would book again soon

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Wonderfully helpful staff super comfortable bed pillows the bathroom contained Clarins products The breakfast was delicious even included gluten free options We were on level 5 didn t hear any noise ever Absolutely loved this hotel would return or recommend in a heart beat

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The only thing I can think of that could be improved is the range of English TV channels but not a big deal
Positive_Review: Friendly multi lingual staff on reception and serving breakfast Comfortable room and bed Beautiful decoration in the bar area Very quiet and relaxing hotel Lovely old French lift Very nice modern bathroom with lovely shower

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: nothing that the hotel can do about but the area is not the best one there were a few drunk people around the tube all day but we didn t feel any threat 0 8 for this only
Positive_Review: polite friendly kind staff amazing french breakfast everything really tasty great breakfast bar area fully newly renovated great room huge double bed comfortable clean clean bathroom everything fully newly renovated wifi in the room with no extra charge fast 2 mis away from the tube on foot 15 mins walk from Louvre all the spaces of the hotel exactly as shown in the photos we love great hotels in a good price so this is a place to stay if you are looking for a similar service

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Lovely staff Offered us a free upgrade to suite and champagne as we were on our honeymoon Set up the child s bed for us during check in Very smooth stay Clean and tastefully decorated hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The 25 EUR breakfast price is rather expensive comparing the coffes prices in the near
Positive_Review: New clean and nice room with a comfortable bed The hotel is closed to the metro station as well The staff are very helpfull

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Good breakfast AC was not working properly but later fixed body gel and conditioner not refilled but filled when asked Excellent customer service and people at the counter who had an answer to all your questions very friendly and courteous

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Some stuff like liquid hand soap and shower gel was missing when we checked in the shower gel issue was not solved following days however we had our own and we did not notify reception
Positive_Review: The hotel is very nice comfy bed and mega helpful reception stuff Is close to metro station city centre and there are quite a few nice places to eat around the hotel We did not include breakfast as there are different nice options around the hotel cheaper as well

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: We asked a quite room we were given a room at first floor road side quite noisy you hear music from the lobby Service not always in line with a 4 stars hotel in experienced very young staff
Positive_Review: Hotel situated in a calm and residential neighbourhood Clean rooms comfortable bathroom with spacious for Paris standard shower Beautiful Lobby

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Had to keep asking for black tea bags Just a paper cup in the room for tea Maid wasn t very friendly
Positive_Review: Very friendly and attentive staff at reception and in the lounge Ismail was very welcoming at the bar Newly renovated Very quiet room

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Gym was too small Dinner options in hotel minimal Breakfast didn t cater for DF GF
Positive_Review: Nice hotel comfortable room well located for Bonne Nouvelle metro and cafes

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: The hotel was pristine very clean and very comfortable The room was quiet for such a central location The staff were helpful in suggesting good nearby restaurants

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: 1 if possible please offer the English version of menu during the late evening hours in Le Bar 38
Positive_Review: Reasonable price Quick and easy check in check out Reliable and friendly front desk staffs willing to help visitors to find local information modern French decoration Excellent breakfast buffet at affordable and reasonable price restricted but adequate facilities less is more

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: 1 the quality of the Clarins conditioner offered in the bathroom not moist enough for dry weather 2 minor soap residuals in the walk in shower
Positive_Review: 1 Friendly and polite front desk staffs 2 Clean and newly renovated guestrooms 3 The towel warmer rack in bath room my own towel was totally dried in the next morning thus I can put it back in my suitcase without hesitation and the possible bad smell 4 Walk in shower facilities is good for relaxing a whole day sightseeing in the city 5 Modern design guestroom 6 The antique feel elevator 7 Smart well dressed and reliable front desk staffs 8 Delicious breakfast buffet at affordable and reasonable price 9 Positive attitude of waiters le bar 38 willing to correct their unfavorable attitude after our voice out 10 sizeable and comfortable beds 12 offering paper coffee cup for travelers carring on the road impressive 11 nice and clean bathroom with adequate light 12 the service of baggage storage for few days 13 a smart way to offer a curtain to hide the guestroom door 14 the use of durable cloth for sofa is a smart way

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Would have been good to have breakfast included in the rate
Positive_Review: The room was large by Parisian standards we took a junior suite as it was comparable in price to a triple room We had three single and very comfortable beds as requested Bathroom had separate shower and bath with all Clarins products The hotel was quiet and the staff at reception very welcoming and helpful Would definitely stay again as there are great little restaurants near by If you re looking to be in the thick of the Paris tourist district perhaps not the best location but if like us you have been to Paris several times and like to be in an area with a more local vibe then would highly recommend

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: The room is very comfortable and clean Hotel location is very close to two of most central metro stations 8 and 9 metro lines so it is very easy to travel touristic places around Paris by metro Moreover we have not faced with any noise problem regarding both hotel and distrcit

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The usual gripe about the tea coffee milk supplies in the room but if that is all I can think of to dislike then I ll happily take that
Positive_Review: Good hotel in a good area but what makes the hotel exceptional are the staff The reception staff are really nice kind genuine people

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: 25 Euro for breakfast is taking the mickey but there are loads of cafes close by for petit dejeuner
Positive_Review: Nice room reasonably sized for Paris V comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: The air con wasn t working fine for us in April but best check with the hotel it is fixed Free WiFi was okay but a bit of a pain registration process and slow there s a paid for premium service if you want it Check in staff was very friendly but the systems were a little slow Gym was compact 3 cardio machines and some free weights but nicely decorated For it s style could have done with a few kettlebells a barbell medicine balls etc
Positive_Review: Great hotel friendly staff a really cool recent refurb in old Art Deco Parisien style Location is handy to the cool liveable side of Paris easy enough to get over the tourist spots and a 15 min walk from Gare du Nord It s a low cost Sofitel but the things they skimp on I was happy enough to do without Great 4 star option

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: bar prices high typical Paris it would have been nice to have a lower cost small continental breakfast available not just the expensive buffet
Positive_Review: Very nicely decorated bar comfortable room great quirky lift friendly staff characterful building

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Great location friendly staff nice rooms with comfortable beds Were running the half marathon so they were happy to provide us late checkout so we could shower after

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Beautifully renovated h tel in art deco style located in a quiet location Very friendly staff who go the extra mile to please us We booked the room with breakfast which was high quality dishes fresh fruits juices homemade pancakes breads bacon eggs baked beans Location was great 3 tube stations within walking distance 15 min by from gare de l est 20 min to st Germain 30 min to the foot of the Eiffel tower There are also plenty of restaurants cafes and grocery shops nearby I would not hesitate to go back as good hotels with decent room and bathroom in a well situated quarter of Paris offering value for money are difficult to find

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect It s just a short distance from a number of metro lines so the location is ideal with easy access to Saint Germain des Pres Trocadero Montmartre and other areas The staff were very friendly particularly the breakfast restaurant staff The room was great and the bed was incredibly comfortable The breakfast was excellent and wide ranging with outstanding pastries They even had little touches like mini chocolate eggs under the tea cups for Easter All in all it was a brilliant stay

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Lovely room with Clarins products in bathroom and robes provided Very quiet and close to the metro Would definitely stay here again Staff were all very friendly and breakfast was excellent

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: I have asked twice to change bed clothes and it was ignored We did not asked to change towels every day but one day we noticed it was one towel short so hope hotel did not think we took it There were no beverages in the fridge on our arrival thanks to an amazing receptionist who brought them later Just quick question are you re feeling the fridge with beverages Olga
Positive_Review: On our arrival 4th March late at night there was absolutely amazing receptionist who provided so much support and information that it looked like we are the most and only welcomed guests in the whole hotel During other days other staff members were professional and polite but never gave that feeling of you are the most important guest in the hotel that that tall black hair receptionist with the glasses gave to us Very pity we do not know his name

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: beautiful hotel very well located The Staff play a vital role in general perception of these hotel which was just great All of the people I met were extremely helpful dedicated and friendly Always with a smile and ready to help with any possible inquiry I ll be back in Paris in few weeks again and will certainly choose this hotel again

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: FABULOUS Staff location facilities perfect Was there a week on business only a few steps from next metro station lots of shops in the area Bonne Nouvelle also great bar restaurant area but street hotel is on is very quiet loved it here definitely again

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: Central location in a nice non touristy area Amazing breakfast room probably the most pleasant hotel common area I have experienced for several years delicious also Terrific staff helpful and responsive Comfortable bed and classy room Excellent Now my go to hotel for Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Positive_Review: This hotel is in a good location close to a metro station close to Gare de l Est and Gare du Nord It s easy to reach all the touristic attraction from there The staff was very professional and courteous Good Breakfast Room was very quiet in central Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel L Echiquier Op ra Paris MGallery by Sofitel
Negative_Review: Minor issue with awkward shower door vs bathroom door configuration
Positive_Review: Excellent hotel will definitely come back Staff were really great so helpful and courteous room was very comfortable location was convenient and not at all far from several metro stations lines The breakfasts were absolutely superb especially considering this is france where past experience has taught me to expect very little in the way of a good hotel breakfast All in all a great hotel can t recommend enough
